messages.title: OPPORTUNITIES FOR EVERY CHILD AND YOUNG PERSON
messages.content: We must maintain a strong network of rural schools... against those who think education can be delivered on the cheap.

messages.title: AGRICULTURE
messages.content: I'm pleased to be part of the EFRA Committee... high standards that British consumers expect and deserve.

messages.title: OUR UNIQUE ENVIRONMENT
messages.content: The Dales and the Moors are the lungs of Yorkshire... taking these steps to protect them

keyPolicies.policyTitle: OPPORTUNITIES FOR EVERY CHILD AND YOUNG PERSON
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Maintain a strong network of rural schools, opposing education on the cheap, providing access to apprenticeships and jobs.
Part of the EFRA Committee, working to maintain high agricultural standards expected and deserved by British consumers.
Protecting the Dales and the Moors of Yorkshire, ensuring clean air and natural beauty for future generations.

issues.education: Maintain a strong network of rural schools, opposing education on the cheap.
issues.environment: Protecting the Dales and the Moors of Yorkshire, ensuring clean air and natural beauty.
